mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.country_code as t_country_code, t.language_code as t_language_code, t.original as t_original, t.original_abbr as t_original_abbr, t.original_type as t_original_type, t.roman as t_roman, t.match_way as t_match_way, t.match_params as t_match_params, t.transliteration as t_transliteration, t.free_translation as t_free_translation
mapper.insert: insert into ct_common (id, country_code, language_code, original, original_abbr, original_type, roman, match_way, match_params, transliteration, free_translation) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transliteration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeTranslation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

original,

match_params,

update ct_common
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language_code = #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original = #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_abbr = #{originalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

transliteration = #{transliteration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
free_translation = #{freeTranslation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

insert into ct_common (country_code, language_code, original, original_abbr, original_type, roman, match_way, match_params, transliteration, free_translation) values
(#{item.countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originalAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originalType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transliteration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.freeTranslation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
